recordTypes.name: County Master Plumber License Application
recordTypes.description: All master plumbers doing work in Cecil County must be licensed by the County in accordance with the provisions of the law with respect thereto as set forth in Title 12, Plumbers, of the Business Occupations and Professions Article of the Annotated Code of Maryland. Prior to submitting an application for a County license, the applicant must present valid proof of his master plumber's certificate as issued by the Maryland State Board of Plumbing, and the applicant must also furnish copies of liability insurance.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Inspection Agency Application Form
recordTypes.description:
Each Electrical Inspection Agency seeking approval to engage in the business of inspection of electrical construction in Cecil County. 

The term of any agency will be for a period of one (1) year, renewable annually upon review of the Board of Electrical Examiners and at the discretion and appointment by Cecil County.

Each Inspection Agency must be an entity in good standing with the State of Maryland and Cecil County.

Each Inspection Agency must be familiar with Chapter 191 of the Cecil County Code and any addendums thereto.

recordTypes.name: Manufactured Home Park License
recordTypes.description:
Any plot of land which may be owned by a natural person, corporation, partnership, association, joint-stock company, society or any other entity of any kind, upon which space is provided and/or utility service supplied for two or more units.
OWNER
Any natural person, corporation, partnership, association, joint-stock company, society or any other entity of any kind.
Â§ 244-2
License required.
The owner of every manufactured home park in Cecil County shall obtain a license in order to operate such park in the County. The license shall be obtained from the Department of Permits and Inspections.

recordTypes.name: Customer Service Request
recordTypes.description:
Request A Service - Report A Problem - Direct A Question

This customer service portal offers residents of Cecil County the ability to request a service, report a problem or direct a question to the appropriate department.

If this is an EMERGENCY, Dial 911

recordTypes.name: Addition Permit
recordTypes.description: Addition(s) to Dwellings, Interior Renovations, Basement, Roof Mounted Solar, Masonry Chimneys, Breezways, Attached Garage, In-Law Suites, Lean-to, Carports, Seasonal Room, Exterior Renovations, Etc.

recordTypes.name: Coin Operated Vendor Application
recordTypes.description: Cecil County Code Chapter 136 : Amusement and Vending Machines of the Code of Cecil County. 136-1 Every person, firm, association, or corporation keeping, maintaining or operating for Public entertainment or amusement within Cecil County any pinball machine (console or other), electric game, shuffleboard, mechanical bowling game, jukebox or other mechanical music device, or any similar device whose operation requires the insertion of a coin or token, shall obtain a license from the County for each device. The fee for the license shall be set by resolution of the Council.

recordTypes.name: Request For Information - LUDS
recordTypes.description: The Department of Land Use and Development Services Request For Information (RFI) form is for approved permits, plans, or other completed projects only.  Request for records or documents for projects under review, enforcement actions, correspondence or other records determined not to meet the RFI criteria must be submitted as a Public Information Act (PIA).

recordTypes.name: Agreement for Landscaping/Afforestation/Reforestation
recordTypes.description:
This application manages the following:

1) Landscape Agreements for Site Plans, Subdivisions, or Critical Area projects.
2) Declaration of Restrictions for Forest Conservation Plans, or Critical Area projects.
3) Buffer Management Plans for Critical Area projects.

recordTypes.name: Site Evaluation Application (fka Percolation Test Application)
Agricultural Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Agricultural buildings intended for the purpose to house farm implements, hay, grain, poultry, livestock, silos, manure pit, or other horticulture products. This structure shall not be a place of human habitation or a place used by the public. If intended use is other than this scope of work use the Commercial Application.

recordTypes.name: Change of Use, Change of Occupant or a Tenant Fit Out Of Existing Building
Backyard Chicken License
recordTypes.description: License to have Backyard Chickens on developed properties over 20,000 square feet.  Not required if parcel is 1 acre or greater.

recordTypes.name: Commercial, Industrial, Construction/Office Trailer/Event Tents/Modular Classroom Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Swimming Pools must be submitted on Swimming Pool Application. If multiple use building each tenant is required to acquire a separate permit & occupancy certificate.

recordTypes.name: Deck, Porch, Gazebo, Pergola, Pavillion, Etc Permit
recordTypes.description: Residential Accessory Structures.

recordTypes.name: Tree Removal Authorization
recordTypes.description: Authorization to remove a dead, diseased, dying or hazard tree as needed within the Critical Area or a Forest Conservation Area.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: Multiple structures being demolished on same property require separate demolition permits.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Permits and Inspections are required for all Electrical Line & Low Voltage etc. in accordance to Chapter 191 including but not limited to all phone, cabling, tv, audio, signs, heating, re-introduction of service, and change of use, etc.

recordTypes.name: Forest Conservation Plan
recordTypes.description: For plans requiring new Forest Stand Delineation submissions. Projects with existing submissions to the Division of Planning & Zoning should not be resubmitted here.

recordTypes.name: HVACR Permit
recordTypes.description: New Installations & Replacements require Permits & Inspections. A Maryland Statewide HVACR License is required for the installation of Heating/Ventilation/Air Conditioning/Forced Air /Hydronic/Refrigeration. License must be active/insured on the Maryland Statewide Website(s).

recordTypes.name: Minor Subdivision & Resubdivision
recordTypes.description: Includes Minor Subdivision, Add-On Subdivisions, Resubdivision (Modification of a Major Subdivision Record Plat), and Ag-Transfers.

recordTypes.name: In-Water Projects
recordTypes.description: Docks, Piers, Revetment, Rip Rap, Bulkheads, Boat Slips.

recordTypes.name: Salvage Yard License
recordTypes.description: License to Operate a Salvage Yard in Cecil County.

recordTypes.name: Low Voltage Electrical County License Application
recordTypes.description: All electrical work performed in the County, in about or in connection with any building must conform with Chapter 191 of the County Code and must be installed by those that are licensed in Cecil County as a Limited electrician depending on the installation.

recordTypes.name: Site Plan (Major/Minor)
recordTypes.description: For projects requiring new Commercial/Industrial Site Plan submissions. Projects with existing submissions to the Division of Planning & Zoning should not be resubmitted here.

recordTypes.name: Solar Decommissioning Plans & Agreement
recordTypes.description: This application manages the review and approval of Solar Decommissioning Plans, and the creation of Decommissioning Plan Agreements.

recordTypes.name: Mobile Home Permit
recordTypes.description: Mobile, Manufactured or RV Home A dwelling unit, including a mobile home, but excluding a camping trailer, travel trailer, truck camper and motor home, which is a movable or portable unit designed and constructed to be towed on its own frame and wheels or which is attached for transporting and designed to be connected to utilities for year-round occupancy.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing/Gas Permit
recordTypes.description: New Installations & Replacements require Permits & Inspections.

recordTypes.name: Hawker/Peddler License
recordTypes.description:
Apply for a Hawker Peddler license here. Typical hawker/peddlers include food trucks, concession stands.
PEDDLER: Any person, either principal or agent, who in/on any public street, road or highway or public place or from any vacant property, whether publicly or privately owned, or by going from place to place or house to house, delivers or distributes advertising material, literature, pamphlets, samples or handbills or sells or offers for sale, barter or exchange any goods, wares, merchandise, service or any other article or thing whatsoever, either in his possession or not in his possession, either for immediate or future delivery.

recordTypes.name: Pool Permit
recordTypes.description: Swimming Pools, Hot Tubs, Spas

recordTypes.name: Residential Accessory Structures Permit
recordTypes.description: Detached Garage, Detached Structure w/ Living Space, Pole Barn, Shed, Storage Building, Porch, Slab, Carport, Fence over 7ft., Lean-to, Gazebo, Pergola, Pool House, Retaining Wall, Ground Mounted Solar, Pavilion, Etc.

recordTypes.name: Retaining Wall Permit
recordTypes.description: Use for commercial or residential as single retaining wall or multiple retaining walls only .

recordTypes.name: Signs, Tanks, Communication Towers Permit
recordTypes.description:
Tower Permits: BUILDING PERMITS ARE NOT REQUIRED IF REPLACING OR INSTALLING NEW ANTENNA(S)/DISH(S) ON EXISTING TOWERS.
BUILDING PERMITS ARE REQUIRED IF INSTALLING NEW TOWER, REPLACING A TOWER, EXTENDING OR ALTERATING TOWER.
BUILDING PERMITS ARE REQUIRED FOR EQUIPMENT PADS 200 SQ. FT. AND LARGER.
ELECTRICAL PERMITS ARE NOT REQUIRED IF ELECTRICAL INSTALLATION IS CONTAINED TO THE TOWER
ELECTRICAL PERMITS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL OTHER ELECTRICAL INSTALLATIONS INCLUDING LOW VOLTAGE.
PLUMBING PERMITS ARE REQUIRED FOR GAS INSTALLATIONS.

recordTypes.name: Single Family Building Permit
recordTypes.description:
Single Family, Townhome, Modular, Multifamily, Apartments, Condo, Duplex.
*Sprinklers mandatory all new dwellings.

categories.name: Division of Development Plans Review
categories.content:
The Division of Development Plans Review is a division of the Department of Land Use and Development Services. The Division is responsible for the review and approval of development projects within Cecil County.

All applications and permits submitted through Division of Develo

categories.name: Division of Water & Sewer Planning
categories.content: The Division of Water & Sewer Planning is a division of the Department of Land Use and Development Services. The Division is responsible for effectuating the goals and objectives of the Cecil County Comprehensive Plan and achieve the recommendations of the Plan's water resources an

categories.name: Division of Permits & Inspections
categories.content: The Office of Permits and Inspections is responsible for the administration and enforcement of building codes in Cecil County. The purpose of the codes is to provide minimum requirements to safeguard life or limb, health and public welfare. The codes shall apply to the construction, alteration, movement, enlargement, replacement, repair, equipm
